name: You, the Dungeon
description:
You, the Dungeon.

As an artist is their cryptic painting and a poet their lines of verse, you shall be this grand construction that exists only in the minds and imaginations of those who observe its description.

What you build shall be an extension of yourself, so build fearlessly and with only your ego to guide you.

Perhaps you will show it to prying eyes and curious hands.

Perhaps you will keep it hidden, its mysteries privileged only to you...
